title: Advent of code 2015 day 01
contents:
input <- readLines(here("data/input/2015/01_input"))



Part 1


df <- input %>% 
  str_split("") %>% 
  enframe() %>% 
  unnest(value) %>% 
  mutate(direction = ifelse(value == "(", 1, -1))

sum(df$direction)


[1] 280

Part 2


df %>% 
  mutate(position = cumsum(direction)) %>% 
  mutate(floor = 1:nrow(.)) %>% 
  filter(position == -1) %>% 
  slice(1) %>% 
  pull(floor)


[1] 1797

title: Advent of code 2015 day 02
description: --- Day 2: I Was Told There Would Be No Math ---
contents:
input <- read_lines(here("data/input/2015/02_input"))

df <- input %>% 
  enframe() %>% 
  separate(value, into = c("l", "w", "h"), sep = "x", convert = TRUE)



Part 1


df <- df %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(sf = (2 * l * w) + (2 * w * h) + (2 * h * l) + (prod(sort(c(l, w, h))[1:2]))) %>% 
  ungroup()

sum(df$sf)


[1] 1588178

Part 2


df <- df %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(ribbon = 2 * (sort(c(l, w, h))[1]) + (2 * sort(c(l, w, h))[2]) + (l * w * h)) %>% 
  ungroup()

sum(df$ribbon)


[1] 3783758
